definition: a storage device that handles data so that the next item to be retrieved is the item most recently stored (LIFO), arrange the order of so as to increase one's winning chances
details:
noun
- a storage device that handles data so that the next item to be retrieved is the item most recently stored (LIFO)
= synonyms: push-down storage
- a large tall chimney through which combustion gases and smoke can be evacuated
= synonyms: smokestack
- a list in which the next item to be removed is the item most recently stored (LIFO)
= synonyms: push-down list
- an orderly pile
- (often followed by `of') a large number or amount or extent
= synonyms: sight
verb
- arrange the order of so as to increase one's winning chances
= example: arrange the order of so as to increase one's winning chances
- arrange in stacks
= synonyms: pile
- load or cover with stacks
= example: load or cover with stacks
